mcq.statement: Which provinces saw Congress ministries formed after the 1946 elections?

options.a: Assam, Bihar, Bombay, Central Provinces, Madras, NWFP (Coalition), Orissa, United Provinces

mcq.one_liner: After the 1946 elections, Congress ministries were formed in **Assam, Bihar, Bombay, Central Provinces, Madras, NWFP (Coalition), Orissa, and United Provinces**.
